NBEV I wrote to NBEV this Sat It is my understanding that many companies including New Age Beverages are waiting for additional clarification from the FDA before rolling out CBD infused beverages I can understand why you need to wait before rolling out CBD infused beverages on a national scale that is obvious However it seems that CBD beverages shouldcould be rolled out in Colorado and California before other national and local companies choose to do so Heineken is already started distributing nonalcoholic CBD and THC infused beverages in California since 2018 If there is no intention to rollout CBD infused products is selected markets where it is legal to do so already including your own backyard please provide additional context why Heineken can legally do it while NBEV is unwillingAll I got back today was Thanks for your comments All else being equal our rollout strategy would be updated on our quarterly earnings calls

NBEV nbev heads I love your passion It would also be prudent to be impartial For Take your eyes off the stock for a few days and youll notice warts pimples under that heavy coat of mascara for each acquisition it becomes harder and harder to integrate and it will affect the business Take cost saving potential with a grain of salt If you look at Previous PRs youll notice statements of x million of cost savings etc but truth is the core brands are still losing millions each year NBEV will become harder to manage as a result of all these acquisitions in various and in some cases competing businesses todays acquisition will cannibalize on existing brands BWs CBD statements are all over the place so far hot air he has agreed to pay Privateer 50 of all EBITDA from Marley CBD and licensing deal only cover US sales to Japan and abroad are not possible unless he negotiates a new deal with Provateer plus he has to pay Marley Family they own brand

NBEV Brent Willis CEO of New Age commented We are extremely fortunate to have someone of Oliviers caliber joining New Age along with the rest of his very powerful team Adding Illy Nestea Evian and Volvic into our offerings is incredible and adding the marketing sales and distribution capabilities of BWR to New Age is equally as impacting

NBEV The combination with Brands Within Reach brings the scale of New Age to over 320 million and further adds to its bottom line profitability BWR and New Age together will have the most extensive onestopshop of healthy beverages available to any foodservice or retail customer in North America with an extensive lowcost national distribution and logistics footprint

NBEV KEY HIGHLIGHTSAdds the globally recognized brands of Nestea Volvic Illy and others to New AgeWidens the gap versus all other beverage companies as the preeminent onestopshop provider of healthy beverages in the industrySignificantly increases the North American Sales and Marketing Supply Chain and Distribution footprints to enable significant capture of cost and revenue synergiesStrengthens brand building sales and distribution expertise in North America to accelerate growth of the combined New Age and BWR portfolios

NBEV the Colorado and Utahbased organic and natural beverages company intending to become the worlds leading healthy beverages and lifestyles company today announced the signing of a definitive agreement to purchase Brands Within Reach BWR including the brand licensing and distribution rights to Nestea Volvic Illy Ready to Drink Coffee and other healthy brands
